instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4925: What is 820-4925? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4925</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Shift key stuck
threads.message:
Clean board, with disconnected keyboard the mac starts up in safe mode and shift key is stuck sometimes enter key doesnt work and or when you press a normal key such as "j" it prints a weird character instead of a "j" same happens with some of the other keys on that same row.

I also tried new trackpad and trackpad cable, same thing.

Also checked and reballed <CHIP>U4820</CHIP>/30 and checked all the pull-up resistors <RESISTOR>R4850</RESISTOR>-62 all are good.

Connector looks clean and inside of it is also clean, going nuts here, first time with this issue.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4925</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Shift key stuck
threads.message:
Post voltage for pins 1 & 8 of <CHIP>U4850</CHIP>.
I had similar case, where I found corrosion underneath J4813; between pins 3 & 4.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4925</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Shift key stuck
threads.message:
Voltage for pins 1 & 8 of <CHIP>U4850</CHIP> 0v even with keyboard connected and SSD

I will resolder J4813 now and test

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4925</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Shift key stuck
threads.message:
In such case, is not Left Shift key issue.
Check if other output of <CHIP>U4850</CHIP> stays high.

Can you access boot menu?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4925</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Shift key stuck
threads.message:
I replaced <CHIP>U4820</CHIP>/30 and <CHIP>U4850</CHIP> also resoldered J4813 MBP is working fine now.

Thanks!
